channel.title: I need help Adding Ncps and zones/ send message
channel.description:
Hello, I'm new and I recently and i lean how to code a little bit and i found a perfect tool that generates codes for moparscape and I'm wondering. When i enter a new script for and ncp dose it matter were i put it....if it dose were do i put it? Same for the "Send Message", "commands" and "items for shops".
Thx peole of moparscape community
